The chunk is part of the `Job` class implementation in a Python document. The `Job` class serves as a base class for CPU-intensive or non-time-critical operations managed by a `JobManager`. This particular segment includes methods related to job execution control (`resume`, `suspend`), priority management (`getPriority`, `setPriority`), and debug printing state (`printingBegin`, `printingEnd`). These methods handle the lifecycle of jobs, including starting/stopping their execution and managing debugging output.

When done, yield `Job.Done`.

    def getPriority(self):
        return self._priority
    def setPriority(self, priority):
        self._priority = priority

    def printingBegin(self):
        self._printing = True
    def printingEnd(self):
        self._printing = False

    def resume(self):
        """Called every time JobManager is going to start running this job."""
